name: Heart of Wales Circular Day & 2-Day Ranger
description:
HEART OF WALES CIRCULAR RANGER One circular journey for either one or two days along the Central Wales Line in either direction starting from any station on the route between 
      Cardiff-Swansea-Llanelli-Llandrindod Wells-Craven Arms-Shrewsbury-Hereford-Newport-Cardiff.
